Uses of Package
org.knime.base.data.statistics

  • Packages that use org.knime.base.data.statistics 
    Package Description
    org.knime.base.data.normalize
    This package contains the utility classes for normalization of DataRows.
    org.knime.base.data.statistics
    Statistics3Table computes statistics for tables, also offers helper methods to create BufferedDataTables from that..
    org.knime.base.data.statistics.calculation
    Default statistics for the StatisticCalculator.
    org.knime.base.node.preproc.pmml.missingval
    Package containing base and helper classes for missing value replacement.
    org.knime.base.node.preproc.pmml.missingval.handlers
    Package containing missing cell handlers.
    org.knime.base.node.preproc.pmml.missingval.handlers.timeseries  
    org.knime.base.node.viz.statistics2
    Contains the Statistics Node which can be used to compute statistics based on the input data table.
  • Classes in org.knime.base.data.statistics used by org.knime.base.data.normalize 
    Class and Description
    StatisticsTable
    Deprecated. 
    use Statistics3Table
  • Classes in org.knime.base.data.statistics used by org.knime.base.data.statistics 
    Class and Description
    SelectRank
    Class to find the median/kth element of a table.
    Statistic
    Base class for statistics used in the StatisticCalculator.
    Statistics2Table
    Deprecated. 
    Use Statistics3Table
    Statistics3Table
    Deprecated. 
    use the StatisticCalculator framework instead.
  • Classes in org.knime.base.data.statistics used by org.knime.base.data.statistics.calculation 
    Class and Description
    Statistic
    Base class for statistics used in the StatisticCalculator.
    StatisticSorted
